title: Scientists worry finalizing ‘Schedule F’ rule will further politicize NIH grant decisions
description: The Trump administration is moving forward with a personnel rule that critics say will subject a broader swath of the federal workforce to political pressure
content: The Trump administration is moving forward with a personnel rule that critics say will subject a broader swath of the federal workforce to political pressure
